this commercial was aired in hong kong
at first glance there doesn't seem to be
anything wrong with the commercial
soon enough however people began to
notice something was not quite right
with the commercial
take a closer look at this part of the
commercial
see this chubby kid with a hat in the
back
we'll look behind him and you'll see the
hair of some girl behind him
unlike the other kids she appears to be
facing down
one of the next shots that shows the
kids from behind the girl is gone
a lot of people thought the last girl
was a ghost and from what i've heard the
commercial stopped being aired because
of the amount of people complaining
about the ghost
the answer to this one is pretty obvious
most people agree that it's probably
just a continuity error
the commercial obviously was not shot in
just one take
so in the first shot here the girl is
probably there during the recording and
during the next shot here the girl
probably just did not show up that day
the editor probably put those two clips
together not thinking much of it and now
people think it's a ghost
nothing really creepy about it
the rumors don't end there though
a lot of people say the kid in the back
ended up dying not long after the
commercial was created and some people
even say that most of these kids went
missing after the commercial was aired
it's hard to do too much research on
